definitions.definition: An act or instance of designating
Selection and appointment for a purpose or office.
examples: His designation as chief justice was controversial.

definitions.definition: That which designates; a distinguishing mark or name; distinctive title; appellation .
Signification , meaning , for example of a word or phrase.
